document.full_text: for three long weeks europe was gripped with fear battling a mysterious e. coli epidemic, and it wasn't until late this week that china's genomics institute nearly 7,000 km away finally put its finger on the culprit.
document.title: china helps unravel new e.coli for embattled europe
lines_and_colors: for three long weeks europe was gripped with fear battling a mysterious e. coli epidemic, and it wasn't until late this week that china's genomics institute nearly 7,000 km away finally put its finger on the culprit.
